plugin-framework plugin_source-interface module¶

  • Index
plugin_source.interface.get_help_docs_uri() → str¶

Entry point for retrieving the plug in package’s help document URI

Returns:

help doc directory URI

Return type:

str

plugin_source.interface.get_plugin_specs() → PluginSpec¶

Entry point for retrieving the plug in projects PluginSpec instance

Returns:

the package’s PluginSpec instance

Return type:

plugin_common.plugin_specs.PluginSpec

plugin_source.interface.get_version() → tuple[int, int, int]¶

Entry point for retrieving the plug in package’s version number from either the pyproject.toml file or a version.py in the project’s root package. The version number is returned as a three integer tuple to allow version numbers to be consistently compared.

Returns:

major, minor and micro elements of the version number

Return type:

tuple[int, int, int]
